125.heading: Femininity.
125.title: Kamikaze Girls
125.author: story by Novala Takemoto ; art by Yukio Kanesada ; English translation & adaptation, Tomo Kimura.
notes: "First published by Shogakukan Inc. in Japan as "Shimotsuma Monogatari"

Summary (from OCLC): Momoko is ultra-sensitive and feminine, picturing herself as a pampered French princess while meticulously embroidering frilly clothes. Ichigo is a member of a girls' biker gang who hides softer emotions and dresses like a feisty boy. When the two young people are thrown together, each helps the other develop new skills for survival and for living as a whole woman.
